entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
